title: An Unfinished Piece for Mechanical Piano | CHEKHOV DRAMA

sources.title: An Unfinished Piece for Mechanical Piano | CHEKHOV DRAMA
sources.description:
A drama by Nikita Mikhalkov.

Based on the work of Anton Chekhov. The film is set at a nobleman's estate in summertime. Anna Petrovna Voynitseva, an eccentric generalâ€™s widow, has guests coming over. Here, after many years of not seeing each other, Mikhail Platonov and Sophia meet again. As a smart and talented young man, Platonov had seen a brilliant career in front of him. Now at the age of 35, he works as a teacher in a provincial grammar school, a loser with ambitions. Sophia, on the other hand, is now a respectable, well-mannered married lady...

Year of production: 1976

Directed by: Nikita Mikhalkov
Written by: Alexander Adabashyan, Nikita Mikhalkov
Director of photography: Pavel Lebeshev
Production designers: Alexander Samulekin, Alexander Adabashyan Composer: Eduard Artemyev
Starring: Alexander Kalyagin, Elena Solovey
